programme.title: Shark Man with Riley Elliot

programme.desc: The death of Steve Irwin led people to believe that stingrays are dangerous animals. But are they?

programme.desc: There's an increase in sightings of the Bronze Whaler Shark. This trend is cause for concern for water users.
